title: Odyssey skins in-game
body:
Since there doesn't seem to be any official LoL account actually uploading a video with the new galactic skins in-game, I did some reserach and found this. Voices are in Latin Spanish but doesn't matter much, I can understand everyhting being from Spain :p
Thank me later {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
Looks interesting. I will definitely play. 

_It is kinda annoying Jinx happens in both PvE modes though, first being Star Guardian._
To be fair, she really fits that punky space style they were looking for.
that sona skin his horrific tbh

Why?
I think it is her best so far besides DJ.
Severely dissapointed that they went with Sona for a skin. As if she not only doesn't have enough already, but the theme doesn't fit with her character at all.

Jinx: Total of 5 skins, last one in 2017
Yasuo: Total of 4 skins, last one in 2017
Malphite: Total of 7 skins, last one in 2015
Ziggs: Total of 6 skins, last one in 2017
Kayn: Total of 1 skin, last one with his release in 2017
Sona: Total of 7 skins, last one in 2016

So it's okay for Malphite to get one, when he has the same amount? lel. Or for Jinx, Yasuo, Ziggs, who all saw them at least last year?

The theme of a skin doesn't HAVE to fit the base champion... it's a skin for a reason. They are alternate universes that bring something new to the champions.
They found a spanish dude who sounds like Liam O'Brien for Yasuo lmao
THAT SONA SKIN IS AMAZING. I NEEEEED IT.
ffs that jinx icon looks mediocre.
You can see their splash arts when their names pop up by the way.
